titles.title: A resolution to refer S.1959 entitled "A bill for the relief of the Menominee Indian Tribe of Wisconsin" to the chief judge of the United States Claims Court for a report thereon.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 12/17/1987--Introduced. Refers S. 1959, a bill for the relief of a Wisconsin Indian tribe, to the chief judge of the United States Claims Court for a report thereon.
